meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kathy Brice Dave Bergmann Bruce Ikawa Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1441.

td.p: Kathy Brice, a principal of a consulting engineering firm originally from Winnipeg, Manitoba
Dave Bergmann, an attorney from Columbus, Ohio
Bruce Ikawa, a college professor originally from Indianapolis, Indiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,801)

tr.td: MYTHOLOGY
AWARDS
SNAKES
17th CENTURY PERSONALITIES
SUPERSTITIONS
FAMOUS LIONS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '[NOTE: This was the 310,000th clue entered into the J! Archive, on 2016-07-06.]

Romulus

Dave
')
